lead_paragraph: In this episode of Teton Gravity Research’s “Behind The Line,” professional skier Sage Cattabriga-Alosa has to tunnel through a school bus-sized mass of snow to access a ski run in Alaska.
snippet: In this episode of Teton Gravity Research’s “Behind The Line,” professional skier Sage Cattabriga-Alosa has to tunnel through a school bus-sized mass of snow to access a ski run in Alaska.
